Text: I dont want to miss this martial arts epic of the ages so..I will download it! svisch!

this isnt "Comet, Butterfly and Sword", this is just "Butterfly and Sword". the difference being the last bit cut out of "Butterfly and Sword", which really changes the ending.

also the english dubbing robs it of everything i liked about the version ive seen before. id reccomend finding another version or watching with the sound off and finding subtitles for it.

PS: i looked and didnt find any other version, so i upped mine: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3569606

If you'd like.
